Name: Basque Burnt Cheesecake
Ingredients:
路 2 lb. cream cheese, room temperature
路 1陆 cups sugar
路 6 eggs
路 2 cups heavy cream
路 1 tsp. kosher salt
路 1 tsp. vanilla extract
路 陆 cup all-purpose flour
Step:
路Step 1
Preheat the oven to 400掳F. Put a sheet of parchment in the cake pan. 

路Step 2
Beat cream cheese and sugar in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment on medium-low speed until very smooth, and sugar has dissolved.

路 Step 3
Increase speed to medium and add eggs at a time. Reduce mixer speed to medium-low. Add cream, salt, and vanilla extract and beat until combined, about 30 seconds.

路 Step 4
Turn off mixer and sift flour evenly over cream cheese mixture using a fine-mesh sieve. Beat on low speed until incorporated, about 15 seconds. 

路Step 5
Pour batter into prepared cake pan. Bake cheesecake for 40mins until deeply golden brown on top.

路 Step 6
Let cool slightly, then unmold. Let cool completely. Carefully peel away parchment from sides of cheesecake. Slice into wedges and serve at room temperature.

Done!

Name: Tuscan Salmon
Ingredients:
路 2 tbsp. olive oil
路 4 (6-oz) salmon fillets
路 Kosher salt
路 Ground black pepper
路 3 tbsp. butter
路 3 cloves garlic, minced
路 1 1/2 c. halved cherry tomatoes
路 2 c. baby spinach
路 1/2 c. heavy cream
Step:
路 Step 1
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, heat oil. Season salmon all over with salt and pepper. When oil is shimmering but not smoking, add salmon skin side up and cook until deeply golden, about 6 minutes. Flip over and cook 2 minutes more. Transfer to a plate.

路 Step 2
Reduce heat to medium and add butter. When butter has melted, stir in garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add cherry tomatoes and season with salt and pepper. Cook until tomatoes are beginning to burst, then add spinach. Cook until spinach is beginning to wilt.

路 Step 3
Stir in heavy cream, Parmesan, and herbs and bring mixture to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and simmer until sauce is slightly reduced, about 3 minutes.

路 Step 4
Return salmon back to skillet and spoon over sauce. Simmer until salmon is cooked through, about 3 minutes more.

路 Step 5
Garnish with more herbs and squeeze lemon on top before serving.

Done!

Name: Strawberry Cake Roll
Ingredients:
路 6 eggs
路 1 陆 cups sugar
路 2 tablespoons oil
路 2 teaspoons baking powder
路 陆 teaspoon salt
路 2 teaspoons vanilla
路 1 陆 cups flour
路 录 cup powdered sugar
路 8 oz cream cheese, softened
路 1 tablespoon vanilla extract
Step:
路 Step 1
Preheat the oven to 350掳F.

路 Step 2
In a bowl, whisk the eggs until pale yellow, about 2 minutes. Add in the 鹿鹿 cups sugar and whisk again until combined.

路 Step 3
Mix in oil, baking powder, salt, and vanilla extract. Add in flour, and fold until smooth and combined.
Pour the batter on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet and spread evenly. Gently tap the baking sheet on the counter to release any air bubbles.

路 Step 4
Bake for 20 minutes, or until cooked through. Invert it onto a plate till room temperature.

路 Step 5
Mix the cream cheese, remaining sugar, and vanilla in a bowl. Set aside. Place the cake on the counter and unroll. Spread the cream cheese mixture in an even layer over the cake and top with strawberries.

路 Step 6
Lift and roll the cake into a roll, then chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.

路 Step 7
Tightly roll the cake bake up. Top with powdered sugar and decorate the cake with strawberries. Slice and serve.

Name: Mulled Red Wine
Ingredients:
路 1 (750-ml.) bottle red wine
路 1 orange, sliced into rounds
路 5 whole cloves
路 3 cinnamon sticks, plus more for garnish
路 3 star anise
路 1/4 c. honey
路 1/2 c. brandy
Step:
路 Step 1
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine all ingredients. Bring to a simmer not a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low. 

路 Step 2
Simmer gently over low heat for 10 minutes.

路 Step 3
Serve warm and garnish with more citrus slices and cinnamon sticks.

Name: Special for Movie Night
Ingredients:
路 Cherries
路 Different types of grapes
路 Blackberries
路 Raspberries
路 Most important: a glass of champagne or wine!
Step:
Step 1
路 Just wash all the fruits and stack them nicely

Step 2
路 Pick yourself a nice glass and pour a glass of your favorite wine!

Do Ahead: Pick a favorite movie and adjust your seat

Name: Crab cake
Ingredients:
路 1/3 c. mayonnaise
路 1 beaten egg
路 2 tbsp. Dijon mustard
路 2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
路 1/2 tsp. hot sauce
路 1/2 tsp. Kosher Salt
路 1/2 tsp. Black pepper
路 1 lb. jumbo lump crabmeat
路 3/4 c. bread crumbs
路 2 tbsp. chopped Parsley
路 Canola oil, for frying
路 Lemon wedges, for serving
路 Tartar sauce, for serving
Step:
Step 1
路 In a small bowl, whisk together mayo, egg, Dijon mustard, Worcestershire, and hot sauce, and season with salt and pepper.

Step 2
路 In a medium bowl, stir together crabmeat, bread crumbs, and parsley. Fold in mayo mixture, then form into 6 patties.

Step 3
路 In a large skillet over medium-high heat, coat pan with oil and heat until shimmering. Add crab cakes and cook, in batches, until golden and crispy, 3 to 5 minutes per side.

Step 4
路 Serve with lemon and tartar sauce.

Name: Eggs Benedict
Ingredients:
路 3 whole English muffins
路 6 slices Canadian bacon
路 2 sticks butter, plus more for the muffins
路 6 whole eggs (plus 3 egg yolks)
路 1 whole lemon, juiced
路 Cayenne pepper
路 Paprika
Step:
路 Step 1
Make the hollandaise: Melt butter in a small pot over medium heat until it's foamy but not yet beginning to brown, 3 to 4 minutes.

路 Step 2
Place egg yolks and 2 teaspoons water in a blender. Start blending, and, working very slowly, add the hot, melted butter until it's all incorporated. Add lemon juice and cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Transfer the hollandaise to a small bowl, and place plastic wrap directly on the surface so it doesn't form a skin. Set aside.

路 Step 3
Poach the eggs: Fill a medium pot with 3 inches of water. Add vinegar, season with salt and bring to a simmer. Using the handle of a spoon or spatula, stir the water with a clockwise motion. Gently crack an egg into the center of the pot, letting the water swirl around it and allowing the white to envelop the yolk. Once eggs are perfectly poached, remove from the water, and let drain on a plate lined with paper towels or a clean kitchen towel. Set eggs aside.

路 Step 4
Using a toaster, toaster oven or regular oven, toast the English muffins until crisp and golden brown. 

路 Step 5
Cook Canadian bacon or ham (or bacon) in a medium skillet over medium-high heat until golden brown and just crisp at the edges, about 6 minutes.

路 Step 6
Assemble the Benedict: Place English muffin on a plate and butter them generously. Top each with a slice of Canadian bacon, ham or bacon, then a poached egg. Spoon hollandaise sauce over.

Name: Little Cupcakes
Ingredients:
路 2 陆 cups flour
路 陆 cup unsweetened cocoa powder
路 1 teaspoon baking soda
路 陆 teaspoon salt
路 2 cups sugar
路 1 cup softened butter
路 4 eggs
路 1 cup sour cream
路 陆 cup milk
路 0.2oz bottle red food color
路 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
Step:
路 Step 1
Preheat the oven to 380掳F and place cupcake papers in a cupcake pan. In a large bowl, sift the dry ingredients (including the sugar) and mix them.

路 Step 2
In a separate bowl, whisk together the wet ingredients until they are well combined, then add some red food coloring. Cut the butter into tablespoon sized dollops and add it to the dry ingredients and beat together.

路 Step 3
Add the wet ingredients to the dry mixture and mix until everything is incorporated. You may want to add a dash or two more of red food coloring until you reach the desired color.

路 Step 4
Distribute the batter evenly into the cupcake papers and bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until the cupcakes are golden and springy to the touch. Let them cool till room temperature.

路 Step 5
For the cream cheese frosting; start off by sifting the sugar into a large bowl so there are not any lumps. Cream the room temperature butter on medium speed until it is nice and smooth.

路 Step 6
Add the cream cheese and beat together until they're combined then add the vanilla and salt. Slowly add the sifted sugar and mix until combined.

路 Step 7
Place the prepared cream cheese frosting in a pastray bag and squeeze it onto the cupcakes

Name: Portuguese Egg Tart
Ingredients:
路 8 egg tart crust
路 戮 cup granulated sugar
路 1 cup heavy cream
路 陆 cup milk
路 1 teaspoon condensed milk
路 2 eggs
路 1 egg yolk
Step:
路 Step 1
Preheat the oven to 380掳F

路 Step 2
Add eggs and egg yolks with granulated sugar and mix well, add milk, light cream, condensed milk and mix together. Sift the tart mixture at least twice to make it more delicate


路 Step 3
Sift the tart mixture at least twice to make it more delicate

路 Step 4
Pour the tart mixture into the tart crust and bake in the oven for about 25 minutes until golden brown on top.

Name: Lobster Bisque
Ingredients:
路 2 Lobster Tails
路 2 tbsp. butter
路 2 Garlic, Onion, and Celery
路 Fresh Thyme
路 1/2 cup Dry White Wine
路 1/2 cup Heavy Cream
路 1 tsp. kosher salt
路 1 teaspoon all-purpose flour

Name: Shanghai Vegetable Rice
Ingredients:
路 1 1/2 cups  rice
路 2 1/4 cups water
路 3-4 heads baby bok choy
路 1 to 2 tablespoons pork oil
路 1/2 teaspoon sugar
路 1/4 teaspoon salt
路 2 tablespoons water
路 2 tablespoons sesame oil
Step:
路 Step 1
Rinse the rice 2 or 3 times and drain. Bring the rice to a boil at medium heat. 

路 Step 2
Separate the stalks and leaves from the baby bok choy. Cut the stalks diagonally and the leaves across.

路 Step 3
Heat the pan and add 1-2 teaspoons pork oil. When the oil is ready, add the bok choy, adding the stalks first, and then the leaves.

路 Step 4
Stir in the, sugar, and salt, and stir-fry on high heat for 1 minute. Add the sesame oil. Stir the vegetables into the rice and fluff it up.

Name: Shanghai Wonton
Ingredients:
路 2 cupsground pork
路 1 teaspoon Shaoxing wine
路 1 teaspoon Soy sauce
路 1 teaspoon sugar
路 1 teaspoon sesame oil
路 1 teaspoon salt
路 1/2 a pack of thinwonton wrappers
Step:
路 Step 1
In a large bowl, combine the ground pork, salt,Shaoxing wine, soy sauce,white pepper, water, sugar and sesame oil. Mix everything together, stirring in one direction for about 5-8 minutes until the mixture takes on a paste-like texture.

路 Step 2
To wrap the wontons, place a 1/2 teaspoon of filling on the wrapper. Fold in half, and gently squeeze around the top of the filling.

路 Step 3
In a separate pot, boil the water for cooking the wontons. While youre waiting, add the sesame oil and ground white pepper to each of your serving bowls.

路 Step 4
Once the water boils, add the wontons, and stir lightly. The wontons are done once they float to the top.

Name: Shakshuka
Ingredients:
路 2tablespoonsolive oil
路 1diced onion
路 1seeded and diced red bell pepper
路 4 choppedgarlic cloves
路 2teaspoonpaprika
路 1teaspooncumin
路 录teaspoonchili powder
路 128-ounce canwhole peeled tomatoes
路 6eggs
路 salt and pepper,
路 1small bunch chopped fresh cilantro and parsley
Step:
路 Step 1Heat olive oil in a large saut茅 pan on medium heat. Add the chopped bell pepper and onion  until the onion becomes translucent.

路 Step 2
Add garlic and spices and cook an additional minute. Pour the can of tomatoes and juice into the pan and break down the tomatoes using a large spoon. Season with salt and pepper and bring the sauce to a simmer.

路 Step 3
Use your large spoon to make small wells in the sauce and crack the eggs into each well. Cover the pan and cook for 5-8 minutes, or until the eggs are done to your liking.

路 Step 4
Garnish with chopped cilantro and parsley.

Name: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
路 1 bottle of red wine
路1 teaspoon olive oil
路1 teaspoon butter
路1kg beef ribs
路2 carrots
路2 onions
路2 teaspoon flour
路2 cup water
路1 celery
路3 rosemary
路2 garlic
路1 teaspoon black pepper
路1 teaspoon salt
路1 teaspoon sugar
